message: annoying <pre> :/

Hola, voy a escribir en ingles porque quiero ser claro sobre este ;) I am looking for developers in Mexico City to work for me.

I have simply too much work and too little time. But many places I have looked is hard to find good people (I tried acciontrabajo.com.mx/). It is not very serious people I have found, so I would like some recommendations where I can find the really hardworking and clever programmers.

Skills: PHP, markup HTML/CSS, Javascript (jQuery), MySQL, some understanding of OO, maybe experience in Flex.

I will educate this person to do the standards needed for the european clients I have (as I have seen quite a lot of horrible programming here in mex unfortunately :( ).

I hope you can give me some advice from this great forum. Gracias!
I am sure there is many great developers in mexico, so I am more than happy for any advice to find the good people :)
Uno de los sitios mas populares para publicar empleos es en computrabajo http://computrabajo.com.mx/    quizá te sirva
@dsch conozco algunas personas que te podrían ayudar. Mandame tu mensaje a mi mail para compartirlo: mauropm@gmail.com Saludos!
@mauropm  @gnuget gracias!
I'm not reading those entries with <pre> anymore.
@axel tip: Click Wrap Text in the top and is much easier to read, I do not undestand why it's not default though
@axel That's rude, considering is not the poster's fault, but a glitch in convore.
@soska Sorry, I didn't mean to be rude, I was just annoyed. And I didn't notice the "wrap text" link before.
Que deseas hacer, soy programador.
@Logydes magento, wordpress, flex, y programacion en PHP, markup HMTL/CSS
@dsch magento es el diablo
a mí me gustó http://www.opencart.com/ . Con ese hice este prototipo http://soleiljoyeria.com.mx/tienda/
@jyr hehe :)
he escuchado buenos comentarios de opencart
The clients don't care about that, they just want jobs done in magento... :)

I'm just upping it. If you know anyone please tell me, it will very likely be full time position. I need a good PHP programmer, that also can do other technical stuff. Used are: PHP, Git, HTML/CSS, jquery (and of course javascript), MySQL understanding af database structure, some knowledge in debian/linux usage into mysql, apache, etc. I will teach the person whatever he needs better qualifications in, only thing I need is a programmer with an excellent logical mind and that can easily take problems from paper to code and solve it. The pay is good.
The reason I post it here is because it seams I get much more serious candidates than using the job sites. Really, it is a horror to be an employer :)

@nRikeDiaz thanks, yes you are right. I will attend these meetups and find people to connect with. As a sidenote I actually did find a programmer through here and is going to see if his abilities match the what I need :)
@dsch i believe the best way to find awesome developers is attending some development  community events: http://bit.ly/gVKAvh .Maybe attending to Programadores PHP meetups would be a great idea :)
@nRikeDiaz Enrique, I have checked the page, and it looks very interesting. However is the talks in spanish or english?
I'm afraid that the talks are given in spanish, i've forgot you aren't very good at spanish :(.
@nRikeDiaz asi... "la practica  hacer al maestro" :) I was just a bit confused as you write in mixed spanish/english at that page.
hahaha yep, i try to make it funny, like the other day in a codecast i said: sup señores! haha
Is difficult finding good people here, hope some of you know some guys that might be serious :)

Noticia: http://www.noticiashacker.com/noticia/ag5ub3RpY2lhc2hhY2tlcnIMCxIEUG9zdBj1-AQM 

[Inglés] D.F: Need ASAP experienced PHP programmer to work up my mexican company with. Skills: PHP, markup HTML/CSS, Javascript (jQuery), MySQL, some understanding of OO, but most important good logical thinking. Should understand english (no need for perfect speaking). Work will be anything from simple markup to big systems, and you will be educated in more advanced fields to be able to lead projects. Work will become full time after initial test. Contact me at http://www.abcel-online.com/
